title: Snapchat to cut a fifth of jobs
description: The social media platform is restructuring as advertisers worry about the economy.

title: Royal Caribbean partners with SpaceX for faster internet
description: Royal Caribbean says it will use SpaceX's Starlink internet system for its entire fleet.

title: Trump's Truth Social barred from Google Play
description: Google says Truth Social violates the company's policies on prohibiting incitement to violence
